name: Jane Pong 000 - Live And Let Bounce
name_original: Jane Pong 000 - Live And Let Bounce
description:
Game made for PongJam.

===============================

In a dark cell of a corrupted prison held by the internal GHOST group, a guard talks with his prisonner.

"Why are you here for?", he asks.

"I am here to put an end to GHOST my friend", she answered.

"Yeah right, many have said that and they all failed", the guard retorted. "And tell me, you who has such a high opinion of yourself... What is your name?"

"Pong.

Jane Pong."

==============================

The goal of the game is simply to escape the place, which means you'll have to bounce your way out of there!

Create walls around you to move, collect keys and defeat two bosses to complete your mission!

Controls:
- Arrows: create walls on the side you pressed to bounce on them (Left arrow = create a wall on your left)
- Backspace: suicide and return to the latest safe area.

==============================

Phew! Well, I didn't have a lot of time to work on this game this week, as I was a bit sick and out of motivation, but I did put some work this Saturday to somehow wrap it up, with a lot of planned content removed.
Hope you'll enjoy this silly take on "Pong"! :)
